verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
With all my heart I'll say
I'm living for Your name
With all to give you praise
I'm living for Your glory Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lost for words with all to say
Lord You take my breath away
Still my soul my soul cries out
For you are Holy

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And as I look upon Your Name
Circumstances fade away
Now Your glory steals my heart
For You are Holy

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
You are Holy
You are Holy Lord

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Evermore my heart
My heart will say
Above all I live for Your glory
Even if my world falls I will say
Above all I live for Your glory (C Em D x2, Am7 C G D x2)

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Em D C Em D C Em D C Em D C
You are Holy, You are Holy, You are Holy Lord...Evermore...
